channel.title: Please Help me! TorvaPkz Source and Eclipse 639 client
channel.description:
Hello everyone. Well, I have been having issues lately with trying to find the ip. Can someone please help me? I searched for 127.0.0.1/0.0.0.0/localhost and there is nothing. There isn't any tutorial that helps. Can someone do that and please show me how to jar it. I feel Lazy.
Have TeamViewer Skype:ali.abid331
Rep+++
(ps its my first time using a 600+)
*Edit:I found the ip on client but on server its not there. I dont see a client.java or server.java or gui.java. Im a beginner coder too. When I send client to my friend it doensn't work too to prove it. I want to jar it and possibly make a webclient. For the client if you want to see why it doesnt work. This is the download link: http://uppit.com/4vep2o1n94bb/Eclipse_639.rar. Don't extract to Desktop! Lots of Files! I put it on torvapkz.no-ip.org. The client only works on my computer. I dont know why. I portforwarded and made an exception in firewall. Please help me!

item.title: Please Help me! TorvaPkz Source and Eclipse 639 client
item.dc:creator: @black_guy42 black guy42
item.description:
@black_guy42 wrote:

u dont need to change the ip on ur server files, only on ur client files

Read full topic
item.source: Please Help me! TorvaPkz Source and Eclipse 639 client
